description: I'm a well-experienced Condition-Based Maintenance Engineer skilled in Machinery Health Analysis.  I've got a Bachelor of Science in Electronics and Instrumentation from Universitas Gadjah Mada, Yogyakarta. I'm passionate about the fusion of technology and security. I've recently earned my Certified Ethical Hacker (CEH) certification and will be pursuing a Master's in Cybersecurity at Monash University in 2024. Let's connect and explore the exciting world of tech and security together!
